temperatures.title: Latest temperature recorded last month
temperatures.subtitle: Daily average aggregates
temperatures.description: Reanalyses provide a numerical description of the recent climate by combining models with observations. They have been invaluable to numerous users in Member States and around the world and have always been closely associated with the excellence of the Centre’s forecast products.
